{{Description|The mysterious [[Domain]] has opened its doors, and beyond its threshold are treacherous and dangerous adversaries on the prowl. waiting for their moment to strike.}}
'''Feast of the Departed Warriors''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/06/14 10:00 - 2023/06/26 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 30 or above
* Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"

===Summary===
* During the event, customize the challenge difficulty and complete said challenge to score points. Upon accumulating specific amounts of points, you will be able to claim the corresponding rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Character Talent Material]]s, and [[Hero's Wit]].
* Starting on the first day of the event, a new challenge will unlock every two days until the seventh day, by which all the challenges will have been unlocked.
* Before you begin the challenge in earnest, you can choose the difficulty level and select certain Tempos to accumulate more points.
* Tempos are factors that can shift the overall difficulty of the challenge up or down, and consist of various buffs that affect the challenger. When the challenge begins, you can select Tempos that suit your own pace.
* Upon completion of the challenge, you will obtain points based on the difficulty of the challenge. Upon reaching a specific tier via the points you accumulated, you will be able to claim the corresponding rewards.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Feast of the Departed Warriors 1.png
|text1  = You must triumph over powerful opponents in "Feast of the Departed Warriors." You can change the {{Color|help|Basic Score}} you can obtain by choosing different combat conditions, while you can change your {{Color|help|Score Multiplier}} by choosing your challenge difficulty. However, your opponents' special traits and the challenge difficulty will also change accordingly...
|image2 = Tutorial Feast of the Departed Warriors 2.png
|text2  = You can choose up to 3 Tempos in each challenge to strengthen yourself according to your opponent's special traits.
|image3 = Tutorial Feast of the Departed Warriors 3.png
|text3  = You will face many opponents {{Color|help|consecutively}} during the final stage's challenge. You can choose up to 4 {{Color|help|party members}} and 4 {{Color|help|standby characters}} before starting. Each time you complete one challenge, you can {{Color|help|freely reconfigure}} your party based on the 8 characters you've chosen to better face the following combat.
|image4 = Tutorial Feast of the Departed Warriors 4.png
|text4  = You can invite a maximum of one other player to do the challenge in Co-Op Mode. The results of the challenge will be recorded for both players.
}}

* All party members' ATK and DEF will be increased by 12%.
* All party members' Elemental Mastery will be increased by 40. Additionally, this effect gains 40 extra Elemental Mastery within 4s after the active character triggers an Elemental Reaction.
* All party members' Normal Attack DMG will be increased by 12%, and ATK SPD will be increased by 10%.
* When a character uses an Elemental Skill or Burst, all party members will regain HP equal to 10% of their Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
* When the active character's HP is lower than 30%, a shield will be created to protect them for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

* All party members' Elemental Skill and Burst DMG will be increased by 15% within 6s after the current active character triggers an Elemental Reaction.
* Character Movement SPD will be increased by 15% and Sprint Stamina consumption will be decreased by 15%.
